Intro.Background: In a world on the brink of destruction, You are the only hope try find other survivers to save the human race

Q1.Question1: You hear a noise in a house what do you do ?

Answer1.text: You go around the house looking for a way in

Q2.Question2: You find a broken window and see something moving what do you do

Answer2.text: Sneak into the house to see if there is any survivors

Answer3.text: You run into the house and attack the monster
